languages.text: "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, сжальтесь же и над бедным юношей! Я отдам вам все, что у меня есть, клянусь Императором! Только помогите уладить мою проблему".

traits.locale_text: "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, сжальтесь же и над бедным юношей! Я отдам вам все, что у меня есть, клянусь Императором! Только помогите уладить мою проблему".
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."
languages.original_text: "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, сжальтесь же и над бедным юношей! Я отдам вам все, что у меня есть, клянусь Императором! Только помогите уладить мою проблему".

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: “尊敬的{mf|大人|女士}，请您可怜可怜我这个年轻人吧！只要你能帮忙解决我的问题，我向帝皇发誓，我愿意把我的一切都献给您！”
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的{mf|大人|女士}，请您可怜可怜我这个年轻人吧！只要你能帮忙解决我的问题，我向帝皇发誓，我愿意把我的一切都献给您！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: «¡Estimad{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}, compadézcase también de este pobre joven! Le daré todo lo que tengo, ¡lo juro por el Emperador! Solo tiene que ayudarme a solucionar mi problema».
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: «¡Estimad{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}, compadézcase también de este pobre joven! Le daré todo lo que tengo, ¡lo juro por el Emperador! Solo tiene que ayudarme a solucionar mi problema».
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: 「陛下、この哀れな若者に御慈悲を！皇帝に誓ってすべてを御身に捧げます！どうか問題を解決してはいただけないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、この哀れな若者に御慈悲を！皇帝に誓ってすべてを御身に捧げます！どうか問題を解決してはいただけないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: « Noble {mf|seigneur|dame}, ayez pitié d'une jeune âme en peine ! Aidez-moi à régler mon problème et, l'Empereur m'en est témoin, je vous donnerai tout ce que j'ai ! »
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: « Noble {mf|seigneur|dame}, ayez pitié d'une jeune âme en peine ! Aidez-moi à régler mon problème et, l'Empereur m'en est témoin, je vous donnerai tout ce que j'ai ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady}, habt auch Mitleid mit diesem armen Jüngling! Ich gebe Euch alles, was ich habe, das schwöre ich vor dem Imperator! Helft mir nur, mein Problem zu lösen."
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady}, habt auch Mitleid mit diesem armen Jüngling! Ich gebe Euch alles, was ich habe, das schwöre ich vor dem Imperator! Helft mir nur, mein Problem zu lösen."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "Sayın {mf|lordum|leydim}, bu gariban gence de insaf edin! İmparator'a yemin olsun size varımı yoğumu veririm! Derdime deva olun yeter."
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, take pity on this poor youth as well! I will give you everything I have, I swear before the Emperor! Only help me solve my problem."

traits.locale_text: "Sayın {mf|lordum|leydim}, bu gariban gence de insaf edin! İmparator'a yemin olsun size varımı yoğumu veririm! Derdime deva olun yeter."
